name: Super Basketball 3D: Free Sports Game
description:
Shoot for the hoop and score as many points as you can.
Let's play perfect Super Basketball game! Shoot for the hoop and score as many points as you can.
In this basketball game you need to power-up, angle and throw the basketball to hoop quickly; to score as many points as possible in a limited time.

How to play:

- Drag finger on screen upwards to fire-up the throwing power (Indicator at left)
- Drag finger left/right to aim the basketball
- Release finger to take a shot for putting basketball in a hoop
- Enjoy making basketball shots
- A fun basketball game!

Time Mode:

- Time is ticking you have 60 Seconds to make scores
- Power-up and throw balls with in the time
- Increase scores by successful goals
- Challenge your friends to beat the highest goal scores

Arcade Mode:

- In Arcade mode; you have 5 lives to go ... with no time limits
- Make successful shots and increase your scores more & more
- Life would be gown when you miss any goal

Game Features:

- Realistic 3D graphics
- Beautiful Basket Ball court with a realistic touch
- Two Different game modes
- Experience throwing ball from 4 different angles
- Easy to control, fun for every one
- Enjoy making basketball shots
